channel.title: CU Sings: People's Chorus
channel.description: Recent content on CU Sings: People's Chorus

item.title: Join
item.description:
Join Champaign-Urbana’s newest community choir! We are a non-auditioned, high-achieving, inclusive chorus; ALL are welcome.

We rehearse on Tuesday nights 5:30pm — 8:00pm at the First United Methodist Church near Lincoln Square Mall.

item.title: Upcoming concerts
item.description:
A New Dawn

The People’s Chorus, will present its fall concert, “A New Dawn,” on Saturday, October 19, 2024, at 3:00 PM at the First United Methodist Church of Urbana. The concert will highlight themes of hope, renewal, and unity, and will feature a special collaboration with Amasong, Champaign-Urbanaâ€™s premier Lesbian/Feminist Chorus under the direction of Heidi Weatherford, and the UU Church Choir, directed by Dr. M. Miguel Rowland.

The program will include:
